snippet: The Roman Catholic Church is using a tactic that could give victims of sexual abuse by priests new reason to retreat into fear and secrecy.
abstract: Editorial criticizes the Roman Catholic Church for targeting the Survivors Network of those Abused by Priests, known as SNAP, which has worked to make public the horrific crimes of pedophile priests; holds by using aggressive legal tactics to compel SNAP to hand over information about its members, the church is giving victims new reason to retreat into fear and secrecy.
lead_paragraph: The Roman Catholic Church is using a tactic that could give victims of sexual abuse by priests new reason to retreat into fear and secrecy.
